name: Festival Wars
description:
Fairy Invasion of Hakurei Shinre. Play as Luna Child, a Commanding Officer in the Fairy Army. 

Objective: Disrupt the Hakurei Shrine festival.

W , A , S , D to move the camera.

Press P to restart.

Click on units, blue means, moveable, red means attackable.

A unit can attack without moving. Just click on it, click attack on the UI, and click the enemy unit on the red square you plan to attack.

Do not allow the enemy to capture your base camp, gg.

Destroy all units on the map to proceed on the next level.

Good luck Luna, and fight again the oppression by the HAKUREI SHRINE ENOUGH IS ENOUGH!
